name: putParamset
description: This method is used to set one or more static device configuration parameters. In contrast to setValue putParamset can set multiple parameters with one call. This is necessary to avoid sending unnecessary packets and therefore cause unnecessary (RF) traffic in some device families.
signatures: Void putParamset(Integer peerId, Integer channel, Paramset values)
Void putParamset(Integer peerId, Integer channel, Integer remotePeerId, Integer remoteChannel, Paramset values)
deprecatedSignatures: Void putParamset(String address, String paramsetKey, Paramset values)

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel to set the configuration parameters in.

parameters.name: remotePeerId
parameters.description: The id of a remote peer linked to the peer. The function sets the corresponding link parameter set.

parameters.name: remoteChannel
parameters.description: The channel of a remote peer linked to the peer or "-1".

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: The parameter set containing the values to set. It does not have to contain all parameters of the parameter set, just the ones you want to set.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of the peer separated by colon.

parameters.name: paramsetKey
parameters.description: "MASTER", "VALUES" or the address of a linked peer to set the "LINK" parameter set.
